name: BreakHack (itch)
description:
BreakHack is a small game intended to deliver 10-20 minutes of fun when you need a break from something else.

It's currently in active development with no set feature list. I'm just thinking stuff up as I go along.

Once I figure out a nice way of creating early access releases I might put some up for people to test and report bugs with. Once the game is completed and I'm happy with it I intend to put it on Steam (and Itch ofcourse) with a minor cost. I'm not hoping to get rich, I just want to make a game and publish it on known platforms so that I can have it in my resumé.

The game will in paralell to the Steam release remain open source. So if you can and want to compile it yourself you are welcome to do that.
